title: Companions API: 500 error (UUID conversion)
description: GET /api/companions/search returns 500 - PostgreSQL string_to_uuid error in TypeORM SelectQueryBuilder

title: Browse screen crash: rating.toFixed is not a function
description: Browse screen crashes with 'e.rating.toFixed is not a function'. Rating comes as string from API, needs parseFloat.

title: Bookings screen crash: Cannot read properties of undefined
description: Bookings screen crashes with 'Cannot read properties of undefined' after a few seconds
